vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Συμεών, ὁ indecl., (Heb. שִׁמְעוֹן),
Simeon (so always AV; RV in Luk.2:25, 34 only), Symeon, a Heb. name for which the Gk. Σίμων, which see, was also used;
__1. the son of Jacob (Gen.29:33): Rev.7:7.
__2. An ancestor of our Lord: Luk.3:30
__3. An aged worshipper in the Temple: Luk.2:25, 34.
__4. One surnamed Niger: Act.13:1.
__5. The apostle Peter: Act.15:14, 2Pe.1:1 (R, txt., WH, txt., Σίμων).†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.shortDef: Simeon, Simon, "he has heard" or "obedient one"
vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Luk.2.25
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Simeón: (1) una de las formas del nombre del apóstol Pedro en arameom(HCH.15:14; 2PE.1:1) ; (2) hijo de Jacob (APOC.7:7) ; (3) un anciano de Jerusalén (LUK.2:25,34) ; (4) llamado el Negro, un cristiano en Antioquía (HCH.13:1) ; (5) persona en la genealogía de Jesús (LUC.3:30)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西面, 西緬, 西門 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "聽"
1) 雅各和利亞所生的第二個兒子 (啟 7:7)
2) 在耶穌的家譜中 (路 3:30)
3) 在聖殿中將還是嬰孩的耶穌抱在懷中的人(路 2:34)
4) 安提阿教會中的一位教師 (徒 13:1)
5) 使徒彼得的本名
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
西面, 西缅, 西门 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "听"
1) 雅各和利亚所生的第二个儿子 (启 7:7)
2) 在耶稣的家谱中 (路 3:30)
3) 在圣殿中将还是婴孩的耶稣抱在怀中的人(路 2:34)
4) 安提阿教会中的一位教师 (徒 13:1)
5) 使徒彼得的本名

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.30;
son of: Judah (G2455J);
father of: Levi (G3017H)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Simeon living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.29.33;
son of: Israel (H3478) and Leah (H3812);
brother of: Reuben (H7205), Levi (H3878), Judah (H3063), Issachar (H3485), Zebulun (H2074) and Dinah (H1783);
half-brother of: Dan (H1835H), Naphtali (H5321), Gad (H1410), Asher (H0836), Joseph (H3130) and Benjamin (H1144); married to Canaanite_woman (H3669);
father of: Jemuel (H3223), Jamin (H3226), Ohad (H0161), Jachin (H3199), Zerah (H2226L) and Shaul (H7586H)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.4.18;
son of: John (G2491K);
brother of: Andrew (G0406); also called Simon frequently; Simeon (Var, KJV, NIV: Simon) at Act.15.14; 1xCephas at Jhn.1.42; 1x3.22; 9.5; 15.5; 1x2.9,11,14; Bar-Jonah (KJV: Bar-Jona; NIV: son of Jonah) at Mat.16.17;
